definitions: 海辺[うみべ] (n, adj-no) beach, seashore, seaside, coast
english: Dolphin Shores
japanese: イルカの[海辺]

definitions: 塩っぱい[しょっぱい] (adj-i) salty,calculating, stingy,scowling, grimacing, frowning,hoarse,inferior, poor, boring, dull
english: Ugh. It's salty! Let's go to the airport!
japanese: [しょっぱい]よう！エアポートにいこうよ！

definitions: ずぶ (adv) completely, entirely, totally
english: God!! I'm drenched!
japanese: クソッ！[ずぶ]ぬれだぃ！

definitions: ドック (n) dock,thorough physical examination
english: Yeah! I could go for that! Let's go to the submarine dock under Junon!
japanese: おう！！　おもしれえ！ジュノン地下の【潜水監[ドック]】にもよってくか！

definitions: 人類[じんるい] (n) mankind, humanity
english: Oh yeah? Well, I'm ready to fight mankind's worst enemy like a real warrior. It's not everyday you get to fight in an inter-planetary war.
japanese: そうかい？俺は[人類]最大の敵を目の前にして武者ぶるいしている。惑星規模の闘いなんてめったに経験できないぜ

definitions: 最大[さいだい] (n, adj-no) biggest, greatest, largest, maximum
english: Oh yeah? Well, I'm ready to fight mankind's worst enemy like a real warrior. It's not everyday you get to fight in an inter-planetary war.
japanese: そうかい？俺は人類[最大]の敵を目の前にして武者ぶるいしている。惑星規模の闘いなんてめったに経験できないぜ

definitions: 武者[むしゃ] (n) warrior
english: Oh yeah? Well, I'm ready to fight mankind's worst enemy like a real warrior. It's not everyday you get to fight in an inter-planetary war.
japanese: そうかい？俺は人類最大の敵を目の前にして[武者]ぶるいしている。惑星規模の闘いなんてめったに経験できないぜ

definitions: 規模[きぼ] (n) scale, scope, plan, structure
english: Oh yeah? Well, I'm ready to fight mankind's worst enemy like a real warrior. It's not everyday you get to fight in an inter-planetary war.
japanese: そうかい？俺は人類最大の敵を目の前にして武者ぶるいしている。惑星[規模]の闘いなんてめったに経験できないぜ

definitions: 戦い[たたかい] (n) battle, fight, struggle, conflict
english: Oh yeah? Well, I'm ready to fight mankind's worst enemy like a real warrior. It's not everyday you get to fight in an inter-planetary war.
japanese: そうかい？俺は人類最大の敵を目の前にして武者ぶるいしている。惑星規模の[闘い]なんてめったに経験できないぜ

definitions: 集める[あつめる] (v1, vt) to collect, to assemble, to gather
english: The President is gathering up all the Huge Materia on the planet. He wants to shoot it at Meteor in the rocket.
japanese: 社長はこの星に存在するヒュージマテリアを全て[あつめ]、ロケットでメテオにぶつけるつもりだ。たいした社長だよ

definitions: 先代[せんだい] (n) previous generation (e.g. one's parents), family predecessor,predecessor,previous age
english: President Rufus is different from the older generation. He'll protect the planet with all of Shinra's state of the art technology.
japanese: ルーファウス社長は[先代]と違う。神羅の持つ科学力を総動員してこの星を守っている

definitions: 総動員[そうどういん] (n, vs) general mobilization, general mobilisation
english: President Rufus is different from the older generation. He'll protect the planet with all of Shinra's state of the art technology.
japanese: ルーファウス社長は先代と違う。神羅の持つ科学力を[総動員]してこの星を守っている

definitions: 勝ち負け[かちまけ] (n) victory or defeat
english: Protect it? No, I don't think so. The President isn't the type to do anything so heroic. It's all just a game to him a question of winning or losing.
japanese: 守る？いや、違うな。そんなきれいな使命感は社長にはない。社長にとってはただの[勝ち負け]の間題。ゲームと同じさ……

definitions: 到頭[とうとう] (adv) finally, at last, ultimately, in the end
等々[とうとう] (suf) etc., et cetera, and so on
丁々[ちょうちょう] (adv, n) clashing of swords, felling of trees, ringing of an ax

滔々[とうとう] (adv-to, adj-t) torrentially, swiftly flowing (water, esp. river), voluminously flowing,(speak) eloquently, fluently, spout forth (a torrent of speech),flood of the times (moving strongly in one direction), current of the times
蕩蕩[とうとう] (adj-t, adv-to) vast, calm
鼕々[とうとう] (adj-t, adv-to) sound of bells or drums reverberating,sound of water or waves resounding
english: They've finally started collecting the Huge Materia from the Junon Underwater Reactor.
japanese: [とうとう]、ここジュノン【海底魔晄炉】のヒュージマテリアも回収作業に入ったか

definitions: 段落[だんらく] (n) paragraph,end, stopping place, conclusion
english: Whew…I hope everything goes all right until we get to Rocket Town. Then, our mission is nearly complete.
japanese: ふう……無事に【ロケット村】まで到着してくれよ。これでミッションもひと[段落]だな

definitions: タッチ (n, vs) touch,being involved in
english: Grrrrgh! Just barely! We're goin' after it!
japanese: ぐぅわぁぁ！[タッチ]のさだ！おいかけるぞ！

definitions: 定[さだ] (adv) certainly, truly
english: Grrrrgh! Just barely! We're goin' after it!
japanese: ぐぅわぁぁ！タッチの[さだ]！おいかけるぞ！

definitions: 追いかける[おいかける] (v1, vt) to chase, to run after, to pursue
english: Grrrrgh! Just barely! We're goin' after it!
japanese: ぐぅわぁぁ！タッチのさだ！[おいかける]ぞ！

definitions: 奪い返す[うばいかえす] (v5s) to take back, to recapture
english: How 'bout us getting there beforehand and stealing it back?
japanese: 先回りして[奪い返し]ませんか？

definitions: 物足りない[ものたりない] (adj-i) unsatisfied, unsatisfactory, insufficient
english: I may be mistaken, but… doesn't it feel like we're missing something?
japanese: 気のせいかもしれないけど……何か[ものたりなく]ないか？

definitions: 志望[しぼう] (n, vs) wish, desire, ambition
english: All I wanted was to become a pilot! I used to be speechless watching the Highwind in the sunset!
japanese: オレ、むかしはパイロット[志望]でさ！ゆうやみに浮かぶハイウィンド！いつ見てもしびれちゃうやね！

definitions: ウインド (n) wind
english: All I wanted was to become a pilot! I used to be speechless watching the Highwind in the sunset!
japanese: オレ、むかしはパイロット志望でさ！ゆうやみに浮かぶハイ[ウィンド]！いつ見てもしびれちゃうやね！

definitions: 離陸[りりく] (n, vs) takeoff
english: Finished loading the Huge Materia! All we have to do now is to ready the cargo ship, Gelnika', for departure and we're done!
japanese: ヒュージマテリアの積みこみは完了！後はエアポートでゆそうきのゲルニカの[離陸]を見送れば、任務は終わりさ

definitions: 見送る[みおくる] (v5r, vt) to see someone off (at a station, an airport, etc.), to escort (e.g. home),to follow something with one's eyes until it is out of sight,to let pass, to pass up (an opportunity etc.), to let a pitch go by (baseball), to watch a batted ball go into the stands,to shelve (a plan, deliberation on a bill, etc.), to postpone,to have someone related or close to you die, to bury someone,to take care of somebody until he dies,to wait and see, to continue (e.g. in legal contexts)
english: Finished loading the Huge Materia! All we have to do now is to ready the cargo ship, Gelnika', for departure and we're done!
japanese: ヒュージマテリアの積みこみは完了！後はエアポートでゆそうきのゲルニカの離陸を[見送れ]ば、任務は終わりさ

definitions: 機体[きたい] (n) fuselage, airframe
english: I miss that bikini girl on the side of the plane.
japanese: オレ、あの[機体]の水着の女の子のファンだったのに

definitions: 借り出す[かりだす] (v5s, vt) to borrow, to take out
狩り出す[かりだす] (v5s, vt) to hunt out, to flush out, to round up,to impress, to recruit
english: Right now the Shinra's using it to gather the Huge Materia from the Corel Reactor and from the Fort Condor Reactor.
japanese: 今、神羅軍は【コレル魔晄炉】と【コンドルフォート魔晄炉】のヒュージマテリア回収ミッションに[かりださ]れてんだ

definitions: 飛び回る[とびまわる] (v5r, vi) to fly about, to skip about, to bustle about
english: The Gelnika's flying all over the place! The only one that's not busy, is probably me!
japanese: ゲルニカもいそがしく[飛び回っ]てるよ！ひまなのは、オレひとりぐらいさ！

definitions: 空港[くうこう] (n) airport
english: The Shinra's collecting Huge Materia at the Junon Underwater Reactor! When they're done, they'll bring it to this airport.
japanese: 今、神羅軍は、ここ、ジュノン海底魔晄炉のヒュージマテリア回収ミッション中でさ！無事回収したらこの[空港]に運びこまれるんだ

definitions: 送り出す[おくりだす] (v5s, vt) to send out, to forward, to show (a person) out
english: I'm glad we got Gelnika to Rocket Town safely.
japanese: 無事ロケット村までゲルニカを[送り出し]てほっと一安心

definitions: 一安心[ひとあんしん] (n, vs) feeling of relief (for the time being), peace of mind (for now)
english: I'm glad we got Gelnika to Rocket Town safely.
japanese: 無事ロケット村までゲルニカを送り出してほっと[一安心]

definitions: 惜しい[おしい] (adj-i) regrettable, disappointing, unfortunate,precious, dear, valuable,too good for, deserving better,almost (but not quite), close (but no cigar)
english: What…me? I don't mind. I'll just wait here. My life is important to me.
japanese: えっ……オレ？オレはいいよぅ。ここで待機してますよ、命[おしい]ですからねえ

definitions: 徹底[てってい] (n, vs) thoroughness, completeness, consistency,thorough enforcement, seeing to it that a policy, etc. is carried out without exception
english: But, I'm just gonna ignore them. I wanna live to see the end of the world.
japanese: けどね、[てってい]して無視してやりますよ。オレはしぶとく生き抜いて世界の最後をみとどけてやります

definitions: 見届ける[みとどける] (v1, vt) to make sure of, to assure oneself of, to see with one's own eyes, to ascertain
english: But, I'm just gonna ignore them. I wanna live to see the end of the world.
japanese: けどね、てっていして無視してやりますよ。オレはしぶとく生き抜いて世界の最後を[みとどけ]てやります

definitions: 綿[めん] (n) cotton

面[めん] (ctr) face,mask, face guard,(in kendo) striking the head,surface (esp. a geometrical surface),page,aspect, facet, side,chamfer,counter for broad, flat objects, levels or stages, e.g. in a video game
免[めん] (n) dismissal
麺[めん] (n) noodles,flour
メン (n-suf) man, men
english: If that's the case, might as well live on the edge, I say. But before I can do that, I gotta get a license first.
japanese: どうせならスカーッと生きてるよろこびに興奮しながらね。でも、その前に運転[めん]きょですけど

definitions: 海軍[かいぐん] (n, adj-no) navy
english: You know too, right? About Junon Navy's important classified information.
japanese: あんたも知ってるだろう？ジュノン[海軍]の重要機密

definitions: 新型[しんがた] (n, adj-no) new type, new style, new model, new strain (e.g. infectious disease)
english: A new submarine has almost been completed using Shinra's top technology.
japanese: 神羅技術のすいを集めた[新型]潜水監がもうじき完成するんだ

definitions: 待ち遠しい[まちどおしい] (adj-i) looking forward to, anxiously awaited
english: A new version of submarine. I'll be sailing on it. Man, I can't wait!
japanese: 新型の潜水監。俺も乗船することになってんだ。うっ～、[まちどおしい]ぜ！

definitions: 退ける[のける] (v1, aux-v) to put something out of the way, to move (something, someone) aside,to remove, to exclude, to take away,to set aside, to keep apart,to remove (someone) from the group, to shun,to do well despite difficulties, to accomplish despite adversity,to do resolutely, to do boldly
english: We'll take that submarine!! Out of our way!!
japanese: 潜水監は俺たちがいただく！！そこを[どけ]！！

definitions: 湾[わん] (n, n-suf) bay, gulf, inlet
椀[わん] (n) bowl (wooden)
ワン (n) one,woof, bark
碗[わん] (n) bowl (ceramic, porcelain)
ＷＡＮ[ワン] (n) wide area network, WAN
萬[ワン] (ctr) counter for character tiles
english: If you want to enter, please talk to my dog.
japanese: はいりたければぼくらの[ワン]公（ガードハウンドちゃん）に話しかけてください

definitions: 君[きみ] (n) you, buddy, pal,monarch, ruler, sovereign, (one's) master
公[おおやけ] (adj-no, n) official, governmental, formal,public (use, facility, etc.), common,public (matter, place, etc.), (out in the) open
公[こう] (n-suf) public matter, governmental matter,prince, duke,lord, sir,familiar or derogatory suffix
english: If you want to enter, please talk to my dog.
japanese: はいりたければぼくらのワン[公]（ガードハウンドちゃん）に話しかけてください

definitions: 舌[した] (n) tongue,tongue-like object, clapper (of a bell), talon (of a lock)
下[した] (n-pref) below, down, under, younger (e.g. daughter),bottom,beneath, underneath,just after, right after,inferiority, one's inferior (i.e. one's junior),trade-in,preliminary, preparatory
簧[した] (n) reed (of a woodwind, etc.)
english: …gulp… Going do---wn.
japanese: ドキドキ……[した]へまいりま～す

definitions: 減らす[へらす] (v5s, vt) to abate, to decrease, to diminish, to shorten
english: …gulp… (Great…there went two perfectly good men!)
japanese: ドキドキ……（キッ～～！　よくも……わたしのファンを[減らし]たわね！）

definitions: 足[あし] (n) foot,leg,gait,pace,bottom structural component (i.e. radical) of a kanji,means of transportation,money, coin
悪し[あし] (n) evil
葦[あし] (n, adj-no) common reed (Phragmites australis)
アシ (n, vs) assistant
english: Damn, just missed it!
japanese: ひと[あし]遅かったか！

definitions: 出遅れる[でおくれる] (v1, vi) to get a late start
english: We were too late…
japanese: [出遅れ]たな……

definitions: 断る[ことわる] (v5r, vt) to refuse, to reject, to dismiss, to turn down, to decline,to inform, to give notice, to tell in advance,to ask leave, to excuse oneself (from)
english: I refuse…
japanese: [断わる]……

definitions: ギャラ (n) fee paid to performing artists, etc.
english: You know I don't work cheap!
japanese: オレ様の[ギャラ]はち～とばかり高いぜ

definitions: 届ける[とどける] (v1, vt) to deliver, to forward, to send,to report, to notify, to file notice (to the authorities), to give notice, to register
english: Either give it to us or else.
japanese: 俺たちに渡すか、ルーファウスに[届ける]か……

definitions: 優先[ゆうせん] (n, vs, adj-no) preference, priority, precedence
english: My priority is the Huge Materia!
japanese: 今はヒュージマテリアが最[優先]だ、と！

definitions: 早く[はやく] (adv) early, soon,quickly, swiftly, rapidly, fast
english: We have to go after it!
japanese: は、[早く]追わないと！

definitions: 助ける[たすける] (v1, vt) to save, to rescue,to help, to assist,to support (financially), to contribute (to), to provide aid,to facilitate, to stimulate, to promote, to contribute to
english: P…Please!! Spare me!!
japanese: はっ！！命だけはお[たすけ]！！

definitions: 堀[ほり] (n) moat, fosse,canal, ditch
捕吏[ほり] (n) constable, policeman
彫り[ほり] (n) carving, engraving,chiselled features
english: Be grateful. I'm taking you prisoner.
japanese: 感謝しろよ。[ほり]ょにしてやる

definitions: 脛[すね] (n) shin, shank, lower leg
english: You're pretty nice!
japanese: やさしいでやん[すね]！

definitions: 力ずく[ちからずく] (n, adj-no) (brute) force, using all one's might
english: You want the Sub? Just try an' take it!
japanese: 潜水監がほしけりゃ[力ずく]で奪ってみな！

definitions: 強気[つよき] (adj-na, adj-no, n) confident, assured, self-assured, firm, strong, cocksure,bullish (e.g. market)
豪儀[ごうぎ] (adj-na, adj-no) great, grand,obstinate, stubborn
english: Um…sir! Maybe we shouldn't piss them off…
japanese: ああ……先輩！そんな[強気]な発言は…

definitions: 発言[はつげん] (n, vs) statement, remark, observation, utterance, speech, proposal
english: Um…sir! Maybe we shouldn't piss them off…
japanese: ああ……先輩！そんな強気な[発言]は…

definitions: 深海[しんかい] (n, adj-no) deep sea, depths of the sea, ocean depths
english: We're at the bottom of the sea.
japanese: ここは[深海]だぞ

definitions: 思い残す[おもいのこす] (v5s, vt) to regret
english: I'm back! An' now I got no regrets!!
japanese: 待たせたなっ！[思い残す]ことはないっ！！

definitions: 否む[いなむ] (v5m, vt) to refuse, to decline,to deny
english: Someone…please. I'm sorry I can't take it anymore.
japanese: だれか、すまない……。俺、もうげんか[いなん]だ

definitions: ピコピコ (adv, adv-to) blip blop (i.e. video game sounds)
english: Stop your blubberin'!! How we gonna move this without you?
japanese: [ピコピコ]しやがって！！どうやって動かすんだ？

definitions: シート (n) seat,sheet
english: I can't fit in this seat..." No good!
japanese: あかん！[シート]にすわられへん！

definitions: ピコ (pref) pico-, 10^-12
english: EY!! Looks likes we're almost on our way! Just keep on fiddlin' with it!!
japanese: おっ！！　いけそうだぜ！この[ピコ]ピコ！！

definitions: 護衛[ごえい] (n, vs) guard, convoy, escort
english: Presently on the ocean floor near Junon, a Red Leader Submarine carrying Huge Materia is being escorted by covert Shinra Submarine Units.
japanese: 現在、ジュノン海底には、ヒュージマテリアを積んだ赤いボス潜水監を[護衛]するため神羅海軍潜水監隊が潜行している模様。

definitions: 模様[もよう] (n) pattern, figure, design,state, condition,conjecture of the current situation, the way it seems,model, pattern, example,indicates that something seems likely (e.g. rain or storm),framework (in go), territorial framework, moyo
english: Presently on the ocean floor near Junon, a Red Leader Submarine carrying Huge Materia is being escorted by covert Shinra Submarine Units.
japanese: 現在、ジュノン海底には、ヒュージマテリアを積んだ赤いボス潜水監を護衛するため神羅海軍潜水監隊が潜行している[模様]。

definitions: 捉える[とらえる] (v1, vt) to catch, to capture, to seize, to arrest, to grab, to catch hold of,to grasp (e.g. meaning), to perceive, to capture (e.g. features),to captivate, to move (one's heart)
english: Enemy subs can only be detected within the Sonar area.
japanese: 潜行している敵潜水監は、ソナーはんい内に[とらえ]ないかぎり、認識不可能だ。

definitions: 認識[にんしき] (n, vs) recognition, awareness, perception, understanding, knowledge, cognition, cognizance, cognisance
english: Enemy subs can only be detected within the Sonar area.
japanese: 潜行している敵潜水監は、ソナーはんい内にとらえないかぎり、[認識]不可能だ。

definitions: 米[こめ] (n) (husked grains of) rice,88 years old
コメ (n, vs) comment,(blog) comment
小女[こめ] (n) small girl
個目[こめ] (ctr) the n-th
english: Push [SWITCH] to fire the torpedo! The mines are found on the radar screen at the top of the indicators.
japanese: □ボタンでギョライを撃ち[こめ]！レーダー画面上、のびちぢみする光の柱の上に表示されるのが、機雷だ。

definitions: レーダー (n) radar
english: Push [SWITCH] to fire the torpedo! The mines are found on the radar screen at the top of the indicators.
japanese: □ボタンでギョライを撃ちこめ！[レーダー]画面上、のびちぢみする光の柱の上に表示されるのが、機雷だ。

definitions: 撃破[げきは] (n, vs) crushing
english: Sink the Red Leader Submarine carrying the Huge Materia!
japanese: ヒュージマテリアを積んだ赤いボス潜水監の[撃破]！

definitions: タイムリミット (n) time limit
english: Time Limit: 10 minutes!
japanese: [タイムリミット]は、１０分！

definitions: ワンポイント (n) one point,stitched ornament, small needlepoint design,relief pitcher brought in to face one batter
english: Advice
japanese: 『[ワンポイント]アドバイス』

definitions: 点滅[てんめつ] (n, vs) switching on and off (of a light), flashing, blinking, flickering
english: 2. When the lock-on marker flashes red, launch torpedos!
japanese: ２．ロックオンマークが赤く[点滅]したらギョライ発射！

definitions: 探索[たんさく] (n, vs) search, lookup, hunt, (item of) research, exploration, investigation
english: 4. If you lose track of the enemy, push [PAGEDOWN] and use your radar!
japanese: ４．敵を見失ったらＲ１ボタンの全体レーダーで[探索]！

definitions: 見方[みかた] (n) viewpoint, point of view,way of understanding, way of appreciating, how to look at something (e.g. noh, train schedule)
english: Radar Screen
japanese: 『レーダー画面の[見方]』

definitions: 背後[はいご] (n, adj-no) back, rear,background, behind the scenes
english: The basic strategies are to 1) avoid the indicators, and 2) "Lock On" to enemies from behind.
japanese: 柱をさけつつ、敵潜水監を[背後]からとらえ確実にロックオンするのが基本戦術となる。

definitions: 耐久[たいきゅう] (n) endurance, persistence
english: The lower gauge shows the sub's remaining power.
japanese: 画面下のよこゲージは潜水監の[耐久]力をしめす。

definitions: 示す[しめす] (v5s, vt) to (take out and) show, to demonstrate, to tell, to exemplify, to make apparent,to point out (finger, clock hand, needle, etc.),to indicate, to show, to represent, to signify, to display
湿す[しめす] (v5s, vt) to wet, to moisten, to dampen
english: The lower gauge shows the sub's remaining power.
japanese: 画面下のよこゲージは潜水監の耐久力を[しめす]。

definitions: 警告[けいこく] (n, vs, adj-no) warning, advice
english: Other warnings are as follows…
japanese: その他、各種[警告]の意味は以下の通り……

definitions: 以下[いか] (n) not exceeding, and downward, ... and below,below (e.g. standard), under (e.g. a level),the below-mentioned, the following, the rest
english: Other warnings are as follows…
japanese: その他、各種警告の意味は[以下]の通り……

definitions: バック (n) back,backing, going backwards, reversing,background, background colour (color),backhand,backer, supporter,refunding,backstroke (swimming),doggy style (sexual position)
バッグ (n) bag
english: CONFLICT…Collision with the ocean floor!
japanese: ＣＯＮＦＬＩＣＴ…海底に衝突（[バック]または転回せよ）

definitions: 転回[てんかい] (n, vs) revolution, rotation
english: CONFLICT…Collision with the ocean floor!
japanese: ＣＯＮＦＬＩＣＴ…海底に衝突（バックまたは[転回]せよ）

definitions: 装填[そうてん] (n, vs) loading, charging, filling
english: Loading torpedoes
japanese: 『ギョライの[装填]』

definitions: サイト (n) site (usu. website),sight,payable on sight
english: [PAGEDOWN]: Sight
japanese: Ｒ１：全体レーダー[サイト]

definitions: 高速[こうそく] (n) high-speed, rapid, express,highway, freeway, expressway, motorway
english: Shift up to maximum speed by pressing [MENU] repeatedly. This will enable you to speed up past the maximum speed and outrun the torpedo!
japanese: 最[高速]までシフトアップし、△ボタンを押し続ければさらに限界値までスピードアップ！ギョライをかわすことが可能！

definitions: シフト (n, vs) shift
english: Shift up to maximum speed by pressing [MENU] repeatedly. This will enable you to speed up past the maximum speed and outrun the torpedo!
japanese: 最高速まで[シフト]アップし、△ボタンを押し続ければさらに限界値までスピードアップ！ギョライをかわすことが可能！

definitions: 健闘[けんとう] (n, vs) fighting bravely, strenuous efforts
english: …That is all.
japanese: ……以上。では、[健闘]をいのる！

definitions: ミニゲーム (n) minigame, mini game, subgame, microgame, [object Object],practice game, usu. with reduced players
english: Victorious in Mini-game
japanese: [ミニゲーム]勝利

definitions: 敗北[はいぼく] (vs, vi) defeat,to be defeated
english: Defeat in Mini-game
japanese: ミニゲーム[敗北]

definitions: 応答[おうとう] (n, vs) reply, answer, response
english: …All Shinra Submarine Units, do you read…?
japanese: 『……神羅潜水監部隊全機、[応答]せよ……』

definitions: 一点[いってん] (n) speck, dot, point, only a little, particle, only one
一天[いってん] (n) the whole sky, firmament
一転[いってん] (n, vs, n-adv) one turn, spinning around,complete change, reversal, (an) about-face, sudden transformation
english: Make 'em shut up! Just answer somethin'!
japanese: うっせ[いってん]だ！適当に返事しろぃ！

definitions: 帰航[きこう] (n, vs, adj-no) homeward voyage or flight
english: …Return to Junon Dock…
japanese: 『……すみやかにジュノンドックに[帰航]せよ……』

definitions: 搬出[はんしゅつ] (n, vs) carrying out (esp. heavy objects, artwork, furniture), taking out
english: …We will transport the Huge Materia from the airport…
japanese: 『…ヒュージマテリアをエアポートより[搬出]する…』

definitions: 分析[ぶんせき] (n, vs) analysis
english: …Analysis completed…

definitions: 取得[しゅとく] (n, vs) acquisition, obtaining, gaining possession, purchase
取り柄[とりえ] (n) worth, merit, value, good point, redeeming feature, saving grace
english: …Exact date of origin: undetermined…
japanese: 『……[取得]物の生成年代は特定不能……』

definitions: 不能[ふのう] (n) impossible, incapable (of doing), unable (to do),incompetence, inability,impotence,having no solution (of an equation)
english: …Exact date of origin: undetermined…
japanese: 『……取得物の生成年代は特定[不能]……』

definitions: 判別[はんべつ] (n, vs) distinction, discrimination, distinguishing, discernment
english: …Estimated to be several thousand years old…
japanese: 『……数千年前のものと[判別]……』

definitions: 撃沈[げきちん] (vs) sending a ship to the bottom, sinking (a ship),to sink a ship
english: So this is the Leader Sub…
japanese: これが俺たちの[撃沈]したボス潜水監か……

definitions: 損傷[そんしょう] (n, vs) damage, injury
english: …No damage appears to have been sustained…
japanese: 『……[損傷]はない模様……』

definitions: 一まず[ひとまず] (adv) for the present, once, in outline
english: …phew… That's good to hear.
japanese: ……ふぅ……。[ひとまず]、よかったな

definitions: 気安い[きやすい] (adj-i) relaxed, familiar, easy to access, friendly
english: Hey! Who am I to know?
japanese: こりゃ！き、[きやすく]話かけんな！

definitions: 無条件[むじょうけん] (adj-no, n) unconditional
english: An unconditional surrender, huh?
japanese: [無条件]こうふくというやつだな

definitions: 幸福[こうふく] (n, adj-na) happiness, well-being, joy, welfare, blessedness
降伏[こうふく] (n) capitulation, surrender, submission,yield
口腹[こうふく] (n) appetite,distinction between what is thought and what is said
校服[こうふく] (n) school uniform
english: An unconditional surrender, huh?
japanese: 無条件[こうふく]というやつだな

definitions: アウトサイダー (n) outsider
english: Received "Outsider"!
japanese: 『[アウトサイダー]』を手にいれた！

definitions: 群雲[むらくも] (n) gathering clouds, group of clouds
english: Received "Heaven's Cloud"!
japanese: 『天の[叢雲]』を手にいれた！

definitions: 不倶戴天[ふぐたいてん] (n) cannot allow (oneself) to live (with someone) under the canopy of heaven, cannot allow (the sworn enemy) to live in this world, irreconcilable (enemy)
english: Received "Conformer"!
japanese: 『[不倶戴天]』を手にいれた！

definitions: 区切る[くぎる] (v5r, vt) to demarcate, to delimit, to divide (an area), to mark off, to cut off,to punctuate, to put an end to (e.g. a sentence), to insert pauses or breaks (e.g. when reading aloud)
english: Received "Double Cut" Materia!
japanese: 『れんぞ[くぎり]』のマテリアを手にいれた！

definitions: 目茶目茶[めちゃめちゃ] (adv) disorderly, messy, ruined,absurd, unreasonable, excessive, rash,very, extremely
english: This is terrible… It's all messed up…
japanese: ひどいな……[メチャメチャ]だ

definitions: カオス (n) chaos
english: Received "Chaos"!
japanese: 『[カオス]』を手にいれた…

definitions: 赤ん坊[あかんぼう] (n) baby, infant
english: After that, a child was born to Lucrecia…
japanese: しばらくした後ルクレッツィアに[赤ん坊]が生まれる…

definitions: 罰[ばち] (n) (divine) punishment, curse, retribution
罰[ばつ] (n, n-suf) punishment, penalty
english: This body is… the punishment that's been given to me…
japanese: この身体は……私に与えられた[罰]……
